title: Dread
description: An unexpected discovery forces Lana, Honda and Yuki to rethink their relationship, and Lana to confront her painful past. Then lightning strikes again and shatters Lana's world and understanding of reality -- as shapeless and mortal danger looms on the horizon, Honda finally confesses why he chose her to become his submissive. To her horror, their boundless thirst and dark urges has cursed roots, not only on Honda's side, like what he believed, but also on Lana's. They have no choice: only together will they stand a chance to defeat the heinous monsters stalking them and put an end to the spiraling madness engulfing them. Desperate to protect her most precious treasure against timeless forces bent on destroying them, Lana takes a radical decision in relation to Yuki and attempts to let go of her traumatic past. As a terrible storm gathers above their heads, the time for secret is over. The trio must come out clean with the powerful heads of their families if they want a chance at a real future together and survive what is coming for them.
author: Lila Mina
